bookAuthors: Oscar Wilde, Richard Aldington, Stanley Weintraub
Plot: Includes the following works: Novels— The Portrait of Dorian Gray ; Plays— Salome and The Importance of Being Earnest ; Writings—De Profundis, Critic as Artist, and Phrases and Philosophies for the Use of the Very Young; and selections from Lady Windermere's Fan , An Ideal Husband , and A Woman of No Importance .
